= AUBSarf Installation =

== Prerequisites ==

 * MYSQL
   * http://dev.mysql.com/downloads/mysql/
   * http://dev.mysql.com/downloads/connector/cpp/#downloads
 * QT libraries
   - http://qt.nokia.com/downloads

== Details ==

 * Get our latest version of source code from the following page http://code.google.com/p/atmine/downloads/list
 * Open datrie/libdatrie-0.2.3 & "./configure" & "make"
 * Build the source code using QT for the file src/ATSarf/ATSarfTrie.pro 
 * Run the resulting Executable generated. *Enjoy!*
